name: agent-nexus-cli
summary: Nexus is an autonomous CLI coding agent powered by LangGraph and MCP. It plans complex tasks, persists context via SQLite, and securely orchestrates tools. Features specialized Architect/Code modes, real-time metrics, and human-in-the-loop safety for production workflows.
